ValidationRule.description: Validates that website values start in the correct format.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( BEGINS(Website, "http://"), BEGINS(Website, "https://"), BEGINS(Website, "www\\."), BEGINS(Website, "www.") ) ), ISBLANK(Website) = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incorrect format. Should begin with "http://" or "https://" or "www" or "www\\."
